actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees' group life insurance.

summary.text: Increases the Federal Government's contribution to Federal employee group life insurance premiums from 1/3 to 1/2 of the cost of such premiums. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8707; 8708)

titles.title: A bill to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees' group life insurance.
